TopicTitle: Old squashed ideas for the new lead developer

Articles.Content:
Suggested a great idea for KSP development years ago and had them rejected because 'reasons'. Well now we have a new engine with new capabilities and will/have a new lead developer fresh to impress. I think this is a good opportunity to launch our un-implemented old great ideas back at SQUAD and those new to this great game too.

Ill start.

Kerbals should go splat not poof!
We have a new head developer, but the same Suggestions subforum. Please submit this kind of thing there.
